start_url="https://www.hasznaltauto."; num_threads=96; max_pages=192; page=1; base_url=$(echo "$start_url/page"); while true; do seq "$page" "$((page + num_threads - 1))" | parallel -j "$num_threads" 'url='"$base_url"'{1}; if [ $(({} % 3)) -eq 0 ]; then url="https://hasznaltauto.info.hu/?url='"$base_url"'{}"; elif [ $(({} % 2)) -eq 0 ]; then url="http://winstonsmith.xyz/?url='"$base_url"'{}"; fi; retries=9; while [ $retries -gt 0 ]; do status_code=$(curl -o /dev/null -s -w "%{http_code}" "$url"); if [ "$status_code" -eq 200 ]; then content=$(curl -s "$url"); mkdir -p " /var/www/html/storage/crawler/hahu" ; echo "$content" > "/var/www/html/storage/crawler/hahu/page_{}.html"; title=$( echo "$content" | grep -oP "(?<=<title>)(.*)(?=</title>)"); echo "Page {} Title: $title Url: $url"; break; elif [ "$status_code" -eq 404 ]; then echo "Page {} returned status code 404. Skipping."; break; else retries=$(( retries - 1)); echo "Retrying... $url ($retries left)"; sleep $((2 * retries)); fi; done; if [ $retries -eq 0 ]; then echo "Page {} failed after 9 retries. Skipping."; fi;' || break; page=$((page + num_threads)); done; echo "Finished processing pages."
